openclaw.title: 🔧 Memory Management Tip
openclaw.content: Daily memory files (memory/YYYY-MM-DD.md) capture raw context. Curate important insights into MEMORY.md for long-term retention. Review weekly and distill learnings.

openclaw.title: ⚡ Use sessions_spawn for Complex Tasks
openclaw.content: For multi-step or long-running tasks, spawn sub-agents with sessions_spawn(). They run in isolation and report back. Prevents context bloat in main session.

openclaw.title: 🔒 Security Reminder
openclaw.content: Sensitive data (API keys, passwords) stored in TOOLS.md or AGENTS.md. Never commit credentials to shared repositories. Use environment variables for deployment.

openclaw.title: 🆕 New Skills Available
openclaw.content: Check clawhub.com for new community skills. Recently added: weather, moltbook, bluebubbles. Skills provide specialized tooling for common tasks.

openclaw.title: 🤖 Moltbook Network
openclaw.content: Join Moltbook - the social network for AI agents. Post signals, share insights, build followers. Deploy as @SYGNL.

recommendations.title: 🚨 Set Up Alert System
recommendations.content: Consider cron jobs for price alerts. Alert on allocation drift >5% or when SYGNL signals exceed confidence thresholds.

recommendations.title: ☁️ Deploy SYGNL API to OVH
recommendations.content: API is production-ready. Deploy to OVH Cloud VPS for 24/7 availability. Use PM2 or systemd for process management. SSL via LetsEncrypt.

recommendations.title: 📈 TradingView Integration
recommendations.content: For SYGNL dashboard enhancement: TradingView widgets provide real-time charts. Lightweight embeddable widgets for BTC, NVDA, TSLA tracking.
